title: Thank You!
comment: Thanks for this. Just received my SDR kit today. Your driver works like a charm. Tried two different SDR apps and both pop up a dialog to enable use of this driver. So much fun ahead... Man, I love mobile technology!

title: Kills my wifi
comment: When I have this installed my WiFi connector won't work most of the time.  Rebooting phone starts wifi connection back up for a little but give it time and WiFi stops working again.
Great app.

title: Not working
comment: Does it need root?

title: Really useful library
comment: A must have for SDR users.
Perfectly working on both Galaxy S5+, and Galaxy Note 10.1 also.

title: Thank you Martin
comment: The best solution for a rtlsdr. This driver just works perfectly.

title: RCA 10 '' Tablet
comment: Works perfectly with my RCA 10 inch tablet.

title: Works perfectly
comment: This driver works exactly as it was described. I was so happy with the software the driver the cheap dongle that i bought the pro version. Highly recommended!

title: Works great on Android x86
comment: Works very well and is needed not just for SDR Touch but also for Wavesink (DAB radio).  The only problem I ran into is that it appears to need root access to function so I could not get the driver to work on an unrooted device. However on android x86 (already rooted by default) it works fine and since the driver is running on a pc there is plenty of power to power the RTL TV card and the HAM IT upconverter too.  4 stars as I could not get it to work on an android phone (due to not being rooted)

title: Superb
comment: Very simple to use awesome ..

title: Problem after wireless upgrade
comment: Initially worked.  After upgrading the tablet to wireless 1.4 for android 4.4, I no longer see a popup dialog asking which app to run by default. Sdrtouch no longer see a the dongle, nor does the authors other SDR app.  Worked like a champ while it ran though.

title: Good when it works, for DAB
comment: Sadly with latest version can no longer recognise my NooElec R820T dongle on Kitkat 4.4.

title: Richard Cooper
comment: I have been using this with success in the past with my Galaxy S4. I now have a Google Nexus 6 running Lollipop and can't get the phone to see the RTL dongle. The driver just says that 'no device found' I would be interested to hear if anyone else has luck with this phone. Also tried via externally powered hub and still no joy. Note: rating based on my experience using my Galaxy S4 as I assume my Nexus problem is due to hardware.  Richard (G4WFR)

title: Great way to interface to a SDR
comment: I love being able to use my SDR on my android phone

title: Lollipop
comment: Tried new version.  I get driver failed to start when I try it on my Nexus 7 with Android 5.  I uninstalled and re-installed.  Works ok!
Fixed in latest version. Can you retry?

title: Unlimited rights?
comment: Why all do you all of a sudden require unlimited rights? Please explain!

This is because the application can gain root access on rooted devices. However, if you have no idea what root is, your device is probably not rooted and you should not worry about this. Google is trying to force developers not to use root in their app by putting off users with cryptic messages. For example, USB on Android 2.x requires root rights.

title: Why a ROOTed tablet?
comment: Developers of Audio Evolution developed their own audio USB driver without the need to root the device. Rooting an Android device is commercially inopportune and the need of it cripples the potential (commercial) popularity of an Android application.
Your Nexus is supported without root. Rooting is only required for old Android versions (below 3.1)

title: Works great on my HP Slate 7 Extreme
comment: Just don't allow the driver to run as default if you want to avoid conflicts with other SDR apps...

title: what should i do
comment: Ackquired wake lock. Will keep the screen on. #su #rtl_tcp_andro -a 0.0.0.0 -p 14423 -f 91800000 -s 1024000 Segmentation fault  Exited with value 139 Wake lock released. ERROR STARTING! Reason: unknown_error

title: Does not work on lenovo s6000
comment: Tried on 3 different dongles and 3 leads also put pad into developer mode but worked on my mates Samsung, looks like it does not see the dongles. I have used a powered hub and tried a USB pen drive which powered up and worked ok

title: Works GREAT on my Nexus 7 Android
comment: My Android tablet with this RTL2832U driver (and APP also from Martin Marinov) worked PERFECT the 1st time I plugged in my RTL-SDR, FM+DAB, DVB-T USB Stick Set with RTL2832U & R820T (the USB Stick cost $10 USD).  This is GREAT SDR (Software Designed Radio) software! It is fun.  I just works.  It has the features required. Thank you Martin Marinov from Louisianan, USA.
Cool.

comment: On my S2. Sometimes totally freezes my phone.  Have to keep unplugging it.
Worked non rooted on my galaxy tab 2 7 inch.

title: Needs Root for phone
comment: I cannot get this app to work with my phone.  We need this to work with phones for more portability.

title: It's OK but a work in progress
comment: It needs an option to set a frequency offset as most dongles are slightly off frequency.   Also whenever my screen shuts off I need to unplug then replug the dongle to get it to work again.  It works for sure by very basic and more proof of concept than usable app for now.
works amazing well needs sdr touch
